readable.title: 2781296531_f6f0f6c0f5
readable.content: A boy is splashed in the face by a playground toy at a water park . A young boy at a water park being sprayed in the face by a spigot decorated to look like a seahorse . A young boy is gettnig splashed in the face by a blue water toy . The boy is running through the sprinklers . The little boy is running through the sprinklers .
